logs_from_xxx_to_now_will_be_pushed: Logs from {{- time}} to now will be pushed in the next auto push
sync_desc: Download all logs from all added devices
clear_devices_confirm_title: Are you sure to clear system
clear_devices_confirm_description: This action just clear this device in this application
clear_system_confirm_description: This action just clear this system in this application
clear_records_confirm_title: Are you sure to clear all records?
clear_records_confirm_description: This action just clear all records in this application only, the data in your attendance machine or uploaded data won't be affected
clear_pushed_evidents_confirm_title: Are you sure to clear all pushed evidents?
clear_pushed_evidents_confirm_desc: Pushed evidents are that check if a log is pushed to server or not. This action won't affect your attendance data, but your next push maybe more slower.
please_enter_an_valid_ip_address: Please enter an valid IP address
error_clientToken: Invalid Client. Please enter correct Client Token and Client Password
delete_device_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this device?
delete_system_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this system?
push_modal_desc: Pick the start time & end time of the attendance logs you want to push
logout_confirm_desc: You can't pushing your data to Base HRM after logout
heartbeat_rate_desc: The rate to check the connection between this app and the attendance machine. If your machine is low-end or not performance, you should set it higher.
auto_reconnect_desc: The rate that this app will reconnect to the attendance machine if not connected.  If your machine is low-end or not performance, you should set it higher.
ip_dangerous: Your attendance machine is outside of this local network. This is very dangerous for your data because anyone can access this device and the network maybe not stable to use.
